title: Hosted Botcha Service on Cloudflare
description: Build hosted botcha service at botcha.ai using Cloudflare Workers. Leverage existing packages/cloudflare-workers/ implementation (90% ready). Core scope: JWT tokens, rate limiting, KV storage. Update landing page to promote hosted service while keeping demo.

title: Enhance CF Workers API with JWT & Rate Limiting
Update Client SDK for Token-Based Auth
Update Landing Page for Hosted Service Marketing
CLI Tool and LangChain Integration
description:
Build two new packages to improve BOTCHA developer experience and AI agent ecosystem adoption:

1. **CLI Tool** (`@dupecom/botcha-cli`) - Test, debug, and interact with BOTCHA from command line
   - `npx botcha test <url>` - Test if endpoint is BOTCHA-protected
   - `npx botcha solve <url>` - Solve a challenge manually
   - `npx botcha benchmark <url>` - Performance testing
   - See doc/CLI-TOOL.md for full spec

2. **LangChain Integration** - Make BOTCHA transparent for LangChain agents
   - Tool that auto-solves BOTCHA challenges
   - Wrapper for protected API calls
   - See ROADMAP.md for context
